attributes.action: investigate why, fuel prices have been rising despite the price of crude remaining relatively stable
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The price of brent and crude oil fell dramatically around October 2008, the price of petrol and diesel eventually came down to reflect this fall in the price of crude oil.

Since then the price of oil has not risen significantly, compared to the high at which it reached during the summer of 2008 although the price of petrol and diesel. (even ignoring the 2p tax rise) has begun to creep up again.

Can the government query with these petrochemical companies why the price of our fuel seems no longer linked with the price of the raw product.
